website_summaries.verdict: This affordable universal car radio antenna is designed to fit most cars.
pros: Rubber roof-mount vehicle antenna features expert construction
Sold with an antenna extension cable for added versatility
Adjustable mounting angle up to 30 degrees and adjustable rotation angle up to 180 degrees
Flexible antenna won't bend or break easily
cons: Provides limited signal strength in contrast to similar antennas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap do not buy it plastic chrome
customer_reviews.text: This is the most garbage antena I've seen not good core is empty i get zero reception on my firebird Cheap plastic antena shameful
customer_reviews.author: German Isales

customer_reviews.title: Plastic base, not good reception
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but the base is made out of plastic and I snapped the antenna off when trying to adjust the angle. Returned and received replacement no problem. Now, after installing the new car stereo this antenna was intended for, I'm finding reception very poor. I don't think its the radio. I can't pick up stations that all other car radios can get. I'm going to try a different antenna. Unfortunately this one is a major pain to get back off. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Russ H

customer_reviews.title: This antenna is not what it appears.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a lower priced antenna for use on my boat. This antenna appears to be spring loaded and have an adjustment screw in the ad. It has neither of these. It's just one molded piece of plastic. No adjustment or spring action in this antenna. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kurley Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I really should have reviewed and believed the negative reviews on this product, because it stinks. (And that’s a mild expression). It has no reception, not even local stations. It’s totally useless. Yes, it’s easy to install, but who cares. Unfortunately I installed it after the return period had ended, so the only thing I could do with it is throw it away. For a few dollars more I have purchased a Hernio marine radio, Which is working like a charm. And yes, I am using it on my car. I guess you get what you pay for, never again.
customer_reviews.author: john o

customer_reviews.title: Just sort of ok.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just for the cable, but I ended up using the base too, as this cable didn't fit my ('05 Aveo) stock base. Since so many reviews say that the antenna is fake, I didn't fool around trying it; I just used my old antenna. The cable worked perfectly. The base iffy: moisture could seep in through it, (but you can fix that with form-a-gasket) and it's not at all intuitive how you change the antenna angle.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it and I still was getting static. I switched out some parts, the mast to a 32 inch metal mast for example, and I still was only getting static. The antenna and extension wire is poorly designed garbage. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Mills

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to install but with a bit of effort it works great and mounts flush it also pivots to allow the antenna to be repositioned
customer_reviews.author: richard perez

customer_reviews.title: Xx
customer_reviews.text: I put it on an old 56 tr3. I'd suggest using a heavier longer bolt to make installation easier Haven't I stalled radio so can't say how it works.
customer_reviews.author: RayL.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pick up radio stations on a 2000 Chevy blazer 4 x 4 maybe one or two per city
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Work Fine... Last Long Time!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount! Will fit just about everything BUT not a replacement antenna if the stock hole is already there.
customer_reviews.author: OffGridKindaGuy

customer_reviews.title: Grear value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my tractor and it works great! Can finally use the radio again. It was easy to install and seems like it will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Came broken.
customer_reviews.text: Came broken. Did return & got $ back. Went a different route.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Scobee

customer_reviews.title: decent product
customer_reviews.text: was a good product but material is a bit cheap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add a 2nd radio in the back of my car and it work very good mounting on the roof.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Mead

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install but it did not give any improvement to reception over the broken one it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: David Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. Better than the last cheap antenna I bought.
customer_reviews.author: mike Spears

customer_reviews.title: Used on tractor
customer_reviews.text: Used it to replace the broken antenna on my Kubota tractor. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Celec

customer_reviews.title: Kind of cheap, for good and for bad
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Most of the antenna is decorative and broke off when I tried to adjust the angle. But I have a working radio again and that is what matters
customer_reviews.author: Peter Bingham

customer_reviews.title: Good universal antenna.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace damaged antenna on my tractor. Fit just like the OEM at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: John Jennings

customer_reviews.title: The mount was stuck in the straight position and would ...
customer_reviews.text: The mount was stuck in the straight position and would not move. It was return for a refund and I purchased a different antenna.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ross

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old antenna that broke. Radio reception isn’t any better than the broken antenna, which is worse than the broken antenna when it was new.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It's better than no antenna but the signal seemed to be much stronger with the factory antenna. I probably would look for something else if I needed to purchase one again.
customer_reviews.author: Donny B.

customer_reviews.title: Good reception.
customer_reviews.text: Used it in a travel trailer. Without even mounting it to the outside it got better reception than the old original outdoor one. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Rachel D Mance

customer_reviews.title: where's the rest of it??
customer_reviews.text: I received antenna only, no connecting cable came with it
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence I Shore

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit & operation
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on the back of my Harley Freewheeler trike. I added an SST stereo radio system to the trike and the FM part needed an antenna. It is flexible - won't bend or break if bumped. Picks up signals very well. Very easy to install and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Tom. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality, poor reception
customer_reviews.text: Where I live, we get ONE good radio station and it happens to be what I like, and its a good strong signal. This antenna wouldn't even pick it up. It got better reception (not good, just better than NO reception) when I disconnected the antenna and just held the cable up. I also tried it fully hooked up in an area that gets gobs of stations. My radio scanned without stopping except one or two stations that was barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Todd157k

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Basic antenna that does exactly what I want it to do. I don't believe that spending a great deal more gets you any better reception. Manufacturers don't advertise gain, the measurement of an antenna receiving (or transmitting) signals. If they did, I don't believe there would be a great deal of difference between the expensive and less expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: thekidsarealright

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Stuck in the vertical position ** update- found you must also loosen the nut that mounts the antenna as well as the side Phillips screw. When I had the cable tighten the antenna would not adjust. I tried changing the local and distance function on the radio but didn’t pick up any more channels. I live in a rural area
customer_reviews.author: lost in Misssouri

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap, receives ok.
customer_reviews.text: The antenna works ok it mounts easy but the chrome base should rotate but the chrome coating has sealed it together so can't point it straight up.😕 on well it was cheap and you get what you pay for...........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: adjustable
customer_reviews.text: good budget replacement antenna. worked well in a 1989 Mazda B2200 truck. can adjust the mount angle to get very close to whatever you want. Installation difficulty will vary with what and where you are mounting it onto.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mertz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It is a total waste of money. It is a rubber antenna there is nothing inside. Biggest piece of crap I have seen
customer_reviews.author: hewy

customer_reviews.title: Is okay for very cheap auto radio antenna
customer_reviews.text: Connections and antenna are very cheaply made. Don't expect to last long. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Installed it on my electric golf cart.
customer_reviews.author: wilkewa

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit my car
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with some adapters. It won't work on my car.
customer_reviews.author: Bobwoofer

product_meta.title: 16.9 Inch Car FM AM Radio Antenna, Linkstyle Flexible Mast Radio FM/AM Antenna Universal Car Stereo Auto Roof Fender Radio AM FM Wing Mount Signal Aerial Antenna with Antenna Extension Cable
feature_bullets: Universal car auto roof radio AM / FM antenna fit for most cars. (Note: If you can not adjust the angle of the antenna, please try loosening the screw on the bottom before adjusting the angle and then re-tightening it.)
Universal Rubber Roof Mount Swivel Vehicle Antenna
Durable Material to withstand harsh conditions.
16.9 inches antenna and 53.5 inches antenna extension cable included.
Applies to: automotive and other FM signal reception, increase the reception distance, enhanced sensitivity of weak signals.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars190 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
